events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to request a refund because the product doesn't meet my expectations and I am not satisfied.
The case has been reviewed and categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning wanting a refund.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle this refund request case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, I need to verify the order details. Could you please confirm the order number and the reason for the refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product was not as described on the website and did not function as expected.
Thank you for the information. We can process a full refund for your order. Please return the product using the prepaid shipping label we will email to you.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the refund offer and will send the product back as soon as I get the label.
The refund case has been resolved by issuing a prepaid shipping label for the return and confirming the refund process once we receive the product.
Just checking in to confirm you received the return label and your refund was processed successfully. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since your refund has been completed and the return is confirmed, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey to help us improve our service. We would appreciate your feedback.
